---
title: VuePress commands
icon: program
category: basic
tags:
  - vuepress
---

## Install Dependence

```bash
npm install
```

Or

```bash
npm i
```

## Update Dependence

```bash
npm update
```

## Start Dev

Open local develop environment, please visit[localhost:8080](http://localhost:8080)ã€‚

```bash
npm run serve
```

:::tip
Use `Ctrl + C` to stop local dev process.
:::

## Build project

Generate the files that will be deployed to the server.

```bash
npm run build
```
